events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store but it doesn't fit me well. I want to return it and get a full refund.
The customer wants to return a product and get a refund due to size issues.
Assigning the case to the Returns and Refunds specialist for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is unused, still has the tags attached, and hasn't been washed or worn.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your return request. Please use the pre-paid shipping label attached in your email to send back the item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the pre-paid label—it makes returning the jacket very easy.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your return request.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for shopping with us.
